```{r load_data}
## load data
mapssb <- readRDS("Data_withID_MapSSB.rds")
dt2018 <- readRDS("dt2018.rds")
norgeMapFylke <- readRDS("NorgeMapFylkeID.Rds")
```

```{r populasjon}

dt_pop_ut <- reactive({

  if (input$valg_diab != 3){
    dt1 <- dt2018[db12 == input$valg_diab, ]
  } else {
    dt1 <- dt2018
  }
  
  diabDT <- dt1[kjonn %in% input$valg_kjonn, ] %>%
    .[age >= input$valg_age[1] & age <= input$valg_age[2], ]

  
  dt <- mapssb[kjonn %in% input$valg_kjonn, ] %>%
    .[age >= input$valg_age[1] & age <= input$valg_age[2], ]

  popDT <- dt[, sum(N), by = .(fylke)]
    

  return(diabDT)
})
```
